long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your GitHub experience with the Colorful GitHub Contribution Graph Chrome extension! This innovative tool allows you to personalize the color scheme of your GitHub contribution graph, bringing a vibrant and unique touch to your profile page. With an easy-to-use interface, you can select and apply colors that reflect your style or mood. It's a fantastic way to make your coding journey more colorful and enjoyable. Dive into a more colorful GitHub world where your contributions shine in the hues you love!
